##RSV vaccinations are not currently available

Please try again soon.

IterationRules.Name: NotYetDue
IterationRules.Description: ##Your RSV vaccination is not yet due\n\nYour next dose will be due in 3 months.

IterationRules.Name: TooClose
IterationRules.Description:
##You have recently have the RSV vaccination

You must leave 90 days between doses of the RSV vaccine. Please try again soon.

## You've had your RSV vaccination

BOOK_NBS_INFO.ActionDescription:
## Book an appointment online at a pharmacy

You can book an appointment online at a pharmacy that offers the RSV vaccination. You need to be registered with a GP to do this.

AMEND_NBS.ActionDescription:
## You have an RSV vaccination appointment booked

You can view, change or cancel your appointment below.

CONTACT_GP.ActionDescription:
## Get vaccinated at your GP practice

Contact your GP surgery to book an appointment.

BOOK_LOCAL.ActionDescription:
## Getting the vaccine

You can get an RSV vaccination at your GP surgery.

Your GP surgery may contact you about getting the RSV vaccine. This may be by letter, text, phone call, email or through the NHS App. You do not need to wait to be contacted before booking your vaccination.

MANAGE_LOCAL.ActionDescription:
## You have an RSV vaccination appointment booked

To change or cancel your appointment, contact the provider you booked it with.

HELP_SUPPORT.ActionDescription:
## If you think this is incorrect

If you have already had this vaccination or your personal details are wrong, visit our [help and support page](https://www.nhs.uk/nhs-app/nhs-app-help-and-support/).

CHECK_CORRECT_X.ActionDescription:
## If you think this is incorrect

Speak to your healthcare professional if you think you should be offered this vaccine.

For anything else, visit our [help and support page](https://www.nhs.uk/nhs-app/nhs-app-help-and-support/).

CHECK_CORRECT_ALREADY_VACCINATED.ActionDescription:
## If you think this is incorrect

If you believe you've not been vaccinated against RSV, speak to your healthcare professional.

For anything else please see our [help and support page](https://www.nhs.uk/nhs-app/nhs-app-help-and-support/).

WALKIN.ActionDescription:
## Get vaccinated without an appointment

You can get an RSV vaccination at some pharmacies without needing an appointment.

You do not need to be registered with a GP to do this.
WALKIN.UrlLabel: Find a pharmacy where you can get a free RSV vaccination

CHECK_CORRECT_OTHER_SETTING.ActionDescription:
## If you think this is incorrect

If you have already had this vaccination or your personal details are wrong, visit our [help and support page](https://www.nhs.uk/nhs-app/nhs-app-help-and-support/).
